This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details on 2\4\12 at approximately 0800 hrs, i was exercising in my tv room and looked out the window facing the nw. i noticed a disc shaped white object traveling at a rapid speed in a sw direction paralling the olympic mountains. after about 10 seconds it zig-zaged then disappeared from sight. i have lived and now live near an airport and are used to seeing various aircraft,this did not act at all like an airplane. attached is a pic of the view from the position of the window
Summary: observed a disc shaped object move from the north to the south along the Olympic mountains
